items.name: Leather
items.description: A breastplate of hardened leather, with soft leather covering the rest of the body.

items.name: Bark
items.description: Thick layers of tough, lichen-encrusted bark, with flexible joints of young birch bark or bottle corks laced together. Typically only available in small size, designed for mosslings.

items.name: Chainmail
items.description: A suit of interlocking metal rings over a backing of quilted fabric.

items.name: Pinecone
items.description: An intricate scale-work of hardened pine scales threaded onto a cloth backing. Typically only available in small size, designed for mosslings.

items.name: Plate mail
items.description: Metal plates shaped to the contours of the body. Sections of chainmail provide flexibility at the joints.

items.name: Full plate
items.description: Perfectly interlocking plates of metal over a backing of chain mail and padding. Only the most expert armourers can craft full plate armour, and each suit must be tailored and balanced for a specific individual (takes 1 month). Wearing another person's full plate armour is awkward and only grants AC 16.

_metadata.extraction_note: Review and correct this data before importing
